Package bork

Contains every class needed to hydrate '.bork' files, '.sav' files, and run the Bork game.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttackCommand
    Handles the command to attack something/one else
    Command
    An abstract class that lays the foundation for many Command subclasses.
    CommandFactory
    A singleton class whose main function is to parse commands and create a new command object of the correct type.
    DropCommand
    A subclass of Command that executes commands from the user to drop a certain item in their inventory.
    Dungeon
    A class the represents the Dungeon being played by the user.
    Exit
    A class that represents the means by which an adventurer leaves or enters a room.
    GameState
    Stores, recalls, and creates all the resources for the current state of the game.
    HealthCommand
    Handles the command to view the user's current health.
    Interpreter
    Main class that the user interacts with, manages the game and user input
    InventoryCommand
    Handles the command to view the user's inventory
    Item
    Class that contains all the information about an Item object
    ItemSpecificCommand
    Handles commands for specific items
    LightSource
    Class that extends the item class for the items that can be used as light sources and maintains the value specific for light sources
    MovementCommand
    Handles the movement command.
    NPC
    Constructs new NPC's and holds the means to change their state.
    Room
    Constructs new Rooms and holds the methods needed to change or access the properties of any dungeon Room.
    SaveCommand
    Handles the save command.
    ScoreCommand
    Handles commands to view the players current score
    TakeCommand
    Handles the take command.
    ToggleLightCommand
    Handles command to turn a light source on or off
    UnknownCommand
    Handles commands that cannot be parsed to any other command type.
    Weapon
    A Weapon is a type of Item that deals damage.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Dungeon.IllegalDungeonFormatException
    A subclass of Exception that defines an exception encountered when unable to correctly hydrate a dungeon.
    GameState.IllegalSaveFormatException
    Exception for illegal file formats that pushes the error up the stack
    Item.NoItemException  

Package bork Description

Contains every class needed to hydrate '.bork' files, '.sav' files, and run the Bork game.
